coreAtributes.authorTag: A tag sewn into the side seam reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: short-sleeved combat shirt
coreAtributes.description: A moisture-wicking short-sleeved shirt with reinforced sleeves made from a hard-wearing material. The pockets on the sleeves allow easy access even when the wearer's chest may be obstructed.

replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms through the combat shirt's sleeves as [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] the rest down over [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stuff)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms into the combat shirt's sleeves as [npc.she] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the rest down over [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of [npc2.namePos] combat shirt and roughly pull it off over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] combat shirt back down over [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] combat shirt back down over [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] combat shirt back down over [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] combat shirt up to just below [npc.her] chin.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] combat shirt up to just below [npc2.her] chin.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] combat shirt up to just below [npc2.her] chin.
